wikipedia_page.main: Joanne Malin (born 22 March 1967) is a British radio and television presenter. She is a presenter on Midlands Today.

response: *Joanne Malin, TV presenter, co-presenter of Central Tonight

Actresses who have played the Wicked Queen in "Snow White" stage productions (usually pantomime plays) have included Stephanie Beacham, Lucy Benjamin, Andrée Bernard (as Queen Lacretia), Jennifer Ellison, Jade Goody, Jerry Hall, Lesley Joseph, Patsy Kensit, Josie Lawrence (as Morgiana the Wicked Queen), Joanne Malin, Vicki Michelle, Denise Nolan, Su Pollard, Priscilla Presley, Liz Robertson, and Toyah Willcox. The role was also played by "Lily Savage" (Paul O'Grady) and Craig Revel Horwood.
| Joanne Malin || Mondays BBC Breakfast / lunchtime

|Central Tonight presenter Joanne Malin apologises after swearing during a live broadcast from Trentham Gardens in Stoke-on-Trent. Central subsequently claims to have received no viewer complaints as a result of her description of the inclement weather, but Trentham says several people contact them offering the presenter their support.

response: * 22 March – Joanne Malin, broadcaster and television presenter
*2 February – Joanne Malin joins BBC WM to present her mid-morning show.
* 27 October – Former ITV Central Tonight presenter Joanne Malin joins BBC WM. She will present a mid-morning show from February 2009.
